statements: UPDATE ProteinStructures SET resolution = 2.8, interaction_type = 'Hydrophobic' WHERE structure_id = 100
UPDATE ProteinStructures SET ligand_name = 'ATP', ligand_id = 15 WHERE structure_name = 'HSP90'
UPDATE ProteinStructures SET resolution = 3.2, ligand_name = 'ATP' WHERE structure_id = 101
UPDATE ProteinStructures SET interaction_type = 'Hydrophobic', resolution = 2.8, ligand_name = 'GTP' WHERE structure_name LIKE 'PDB%2M%'
UPDATE proteins SET protein_sequence = 'SEQUENCE123' WHERE protein_id = 1;
UPDATE ligands SET ligand_structure = 'STRUCTUREXYZ', ligand_interaction_details = 'INTERACTION DETAILS' WHERE ligand_id = 2;
UPDATE proteins SET protein_sequence = 'ACTGCTAG' WHERE protein_name = 'ProteinA';
UPDATE ligands SET ligand_interaction_details = 'Binds to receptor XYZ' WHERE ligand_id = 1;
UPDATE protein_structures SET protein_name='New Protein Name' WHERE protein_id=1;
UPDATE ligands SET ligand_id=2, ligand_structure=EMPTY_BLOB() WHERE ligand_name='Example Ligand';
UPDATE protein_structures SET protein_name = 'Updated Protein 1' WHERE protein_id = 1;
UPDATE interactions SET interaction_type = 'New Interaction Type' WHERE protein_id = 1 AND ligand_id = 2;
UPDATE Protein_Structures SET protein_name = 'ABC Protein', resolution = 3.5 WHERE structure_id = 1;
UPDATE Researcher SET affiliation = 'University XYZ', researcher_name = 'John Doe' WHERE researcher_id = 5;
UPDATE Protein_Structures SET protein_name='New Protein Name', resolution=2.5 WHERE structure_id=100;
UPDATE Ligand_Interactions SET affinity=8.3, ligand_name='New Ligand' WHERE structure_id=200;
UPDATE protein_structures SET protein_name = 'Updated Protein Name' WHERE protein_id = 1;
UPDATE ligand_properties SET solubility = 'High' WHERE ligand_id = 2;
UPDATE protein_structures SET protein_name = 'Updated Protein 1' WHERE protein_id = 1;
UPDATE ligand_interactions SET interaction_data = '{"data": "Updated interaction data"}' WHERE interaction_id = 2;
